casebody.data:
BARGE CARRIERS, INC., a corporation, v. THE PENINSULAR AND OCCIDENTAL STEAMSHIP COMPANY, a foreign corporation domesticated in the State of Florida; SCOTT M. LOFTIN and JOHN W. MARTIN, as Trustees of the property of the Florida East Coast Railway Company, a Florida corporation. 36 So. (2nd) 447 July 13, 1948

June Term, 1948

Special Division B PER CURIAM:

Affirmed.
